title: what am i done? why i can't play game
body:
i don't understand why Riot ban to my game ID
since 30/01 2016 12:13
I didn't play LOL today and yesterday
please could you tell me reason why  LOL ID can't play game until  TMW??

replies.body:
Hey there,

You should've received an email with details regarding your ban, if you did not and the ban/suspension was not regarding leaverbuster please feel free to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to inquire about your ban. Please note suspensions are not normally removed.
